_header: The Sunday is Gods own chosen day
Title(s): Narracio quomodo michel duxit paulum ad infernum; Visio S. Pauli
_description: John Audelay, ‘Narracio quomodo michel duxit paulum ad infernum’ (‘Visio S. Pauli’) — twenty-eight 13-line stanzas

BodDou302.First Lines:
þe sononday is godis oun chosyndayþe wyche angelis in
                    heuen þai worchipyn þore…
BodDou302.Last Lines:
…fore al is good þat haþ good endþus counsels
                    ȝoue þe blynd audlay
BodDou302.Attributed Title:
Incipit narracio quo michel duxit paulum ad infernum (f.
                    17ra)
